text: Happy to see this Indonesia coffee chain grow in strength. Their coffee and concept are quite different from the American chains. Good to have variety and competition.
Great refresh حلال Indonesia base coffee franchise. Pure tasty blend coffee taste. You can have it at shop kiosk or takeaway set. Superbly drinking goodness.

First time trying kenangan coffee at this new outlet. Was pleasantly surprised at the flavors. The iced latte was pretty deep and tasty.
Place wasn't crowded and a lot of people seemed to be ordering to go or ordering online.
Staff were friendly and service was good. We just sat inside and chilled for a bit cause the westher outside was so hot

as a non-coffee person (but occasional latte enjoyer) the coffee was too strong and bitter / rough for me idk if that’s normal. has a few seats but is uncozy, with harsh lighting and no music :( . not really for chilling. staff look worn out :( are y’all ok tho.

Giving this place 4 stars because it's practically the only cafe in Vivocity where you have a decent probability of obtaining a seat -- especially during the weekends.

With that being said, there are only 4 small tables here. It accommodates around 3 pax per table.

Coffee is average at best. Banana muffin was excellent because it was heated up before serving. Sausage puff was average.
